tags.description: The school is located in Kpedze in the Ho-West District of the Volta Region, along the Kpedze-Dodome road. The school stands on a 198-acre land endowed with a lot of greenery which creates a cool and refreshing atmosphere.
tags.name: Kpedze Senior High School

tags.description: The school is a Government assisted school funded in 1987. It is located on a leveled ground 30 metres from the foot of the highest peak in Ghana called Mt. Afadja in the Volta Region.
tags.name: Afadjato Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: The Experimental Junior Secondary School was converted into Akome Secondary Technical School in 1991. The school was officially opened on 28th January 1991.
tags.name: Akome Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: The school is located at Dzolo Gbogame, off the Kpedze-Dodome road in the Ho-West District of the Volta Region.
tags.name: Dzolo Senior High School

tags.description: HEPSHS is located along the Hohoe-Jasikan road. It has a total land surface of 225.337 acres. Though the school was located 2 kilometers away from town, it is now surrounded by settlements.
tags.name: Hohoe E.P. Senior High School

tags.description: Leklebi Senior High School was founded in October 1967 as a community Secondary School at the behest of Professor A.C Kumah a renowned Lawyer. The school can be located in the Afadzato South District of the Volta Region.
tags.name: Leklebi Senior High School

tags.description: It is situated at the serene mountain side at Likpe- Mate. It is less than a kilometre from the main road from Hohoe to Likpe-Bala. The administration block is at the foot of the mountain while other facilities are up the mountain.
tags.name: Likpe Senior High School

tags.description: The school, initially a private one, was absorbed by the Government in September 2010. The total population of the school currently is about 400. It is still facing serious infrastructure problems.
tags.name: Shia Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: Located in Liati, about 4km east of Ve-Golokuati in the Afadzato South District, Volta Region, the school is about 600 m, west of the St. Joseph Catholic Church, Liati, from Liati-Leklebi road.
tags.name: St. Daniel Comboni Technical/Vocational Institute
